verses.verse: Bel <S%H1078><s%> boweth down, <S%H3766><s%> Nebo <S%H5015><s%> stoopeth, <S%H7164><s%> their idols <S%H6091><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> upon the beasts, <S%H2416><s%> and upon the cattle: <S%H929><s%> your carriages <S%H5385><s%> were heavy laden; <S%H6006><s%> they are a burden <S%H4853><s%> to the weary <S%H5889><s%> beast.

They stoop, <S%H7164><s%> they bow down <S%H3766><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%> they could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> deliver <S%H4422><s%> the burden, <S%H4853><s%> but themselves <S%H5315><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which are borne <S%H6006><s%> by me from <S%H4480><s%> the belly, <S%H990><s%> which are carried <S%H5375><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the womb: <S%H7356><s%>

And even to <S%H5704><s%> your old age <S%H2209><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am he; <S%H1931><s%> and even to <S%H5704><s%> hoar hairs <S%H7872><s%> will I <S%H589><s%> carry <S%H5445><s%> you: I <S%H589><s%> have made, <S%H6213><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will bear; <S%H5375><s%> even I <S%H589><s%> will carry, <S%H5445><s%> and will deliver <S%H4422><s%> you.
To whom <S%H4310><s%> will ye liken <S%H1819><s%> me, and make me equal, <S%H7737><s%> and compare <S%H4911><s%> me, that we may be like? <S%H1819><s%>

They lavish <S%H2107><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> out of the bag, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3599><s%> and weigh <S%H8254><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> in the balance, <S%H7070><s%> and hire <S%H7936><s%> a goldsmith; <S%H6884><s%> and he maketh <S%H6213><s%> it a god: <S%H410><s%> they fall down, <S%H5456><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> they worship. <S%H7812><s%>

They bear <S%H5375><s%> him upon <S%H5921><s%> the shoulder, <S%H3802><s%> they carry <S%H5445><s%> him, and set <S%H5117><s%> him in his place, <S%H8478><s%> and he standeth; <S%H5975><s%> from his place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> shall he not <S%H3808><s%> remove: <S%H4185><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> one shall cry <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, yet can he not <S%H3808><s%> answer, <S%H6030><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> him out of his trouble. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6869><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> and show yourselves men: <S%H377><s%> bring it again <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> mind, <S%H3820><s%> O ye transgressors. <S%H6586><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the former things <S%H7223><s%> of old: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am God, <S%H410><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> else; <S%H5750><s%> I am God, <S%H430><s%> and there is none <S%H657><s%> like me, <S%H3644><s%>

Declaring <S%H5046><s%> the end <S%H319><s%> from the beginning, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7225><s%> and from ancient times <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> the things that <S%H834><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> yet done, <S%H6213><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> My counsel <S%H6098><s%> shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and I will do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my pleasure: <S%H2656><s%>

Calling <S%H7121><s%> a ravenous bird <S%H5861><s%> from the east, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4217><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that executeth my counsel <S%H6098><s%> from a far <S%H4801><s%> country: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, I will also <S%H637><s%> bring it to pass; <S%H935><s%> I have purposed <S%H3335><s%> it, I will also <S%H637><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> it.
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, ye stouthearted, <S%H47><s%> <S%H3820><s%> that are far <S%H7350><s%> from righteousness: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6666><s%>

I bring near <S%H7126><s%> my righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be far off, <S%H7368><s%> and my salvation <S%H8668><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> tarry: <S%H309><s%> and I will place <S%H5414><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%> my glory. <S%H8597><s%>
